name: valdi
description: Input validation with extendable valid patterns definitions (pre-ES6 version).

scripts.test: alias jasmine-node=./node_modules/.bin/jasmine-node; jasmine-node --junitreport tests/specs/; mv reports/*.xml reports/junit/; git checkout tests/props/*.*
scripts.check-eslint: alias eslint=./node_modules/.bin/eslint; OUT='./reports/eslint/eslint.txt'; eslint src/*.js > $OUT; eslint ./index.js >> $OUT; eslint tests/specs/*.js >> $OUT; echo "DONE!"
scripts.check-coverage: rm -fr reports/coverage/; alias istanbul=./node_modules/.bin/istanbul; alias jasmine-node=./node_modules/.bin/jasmine-node; istanbul cover --include-all-sources -x "**src/tools/**" jasmine-node tests/specs/; rm -fr reports/coverage/; mv coverage reports/; git checkout tests/props/*.*
scripts.tests: npm test; npm run check-eslint; npm run check-coverage
scripts.all: npm run rebuild; npm run tests

author: Martin Swiderski
